question: How can I improve my relationship with my pet parrot who seems to be ignoring me lately?

steps.content: How can I improve my relationship with my pet parrot who seems to be ignoring me lately?
Plan: 1) Search for advice on improving relationships with pet parrots. 2) Return the most relevant and practical suggestions.
Searching for tips on improving relationships with pet parrots.
Found several tips: Spend more time with your parrot, offer favorite treats, engage in interactive play, and ensure the parrot's environment is stimulating and comfortable.
Summarize the findings and provide a concise answer.
To improve your relationship with your pet parrot, try spending more quality time with it, offering treats, engaging in interactive play, and ensuring its environment is stimulating and comfortable.

true_answer: To improve your relationship with your pet parrot, try spending more quality time with it, offering treats, engaging in interactive play, and ensuring its environment is stimulating and comfortable.
